titleStmt.title: A short view of the principal duties of the Christian religion with plain arguments to perswade to the sincere and speedy practice of them : to which is added, a prayer suited to the whole, to be used morning and evening / by a divine of the Church of England for the use of his parishioners.
titleStmt.author: Wrench, Jonathan, 1667?-1741.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
